speaker: mark
text: Jessie, I still can't find my bag anywhere.

speaker: jessie
text: Did you check the classroom again?

speaker: mr. smith
text: Hello, is there a problem here?

speaker: jessie
text: Mark lost his bag. We can't find it.

speaker: mr. smith
text: Don't worry. We will  check the footage of security cameras.

speaker: mark
text: That's a great idea! Thank you, Mr. Smith.

speaker: jessie
text: I hope we find out what happened.

speaker: mr. smith
text: Let's go to the security office together.
